data.text:
――Our Mejiro family, in pursuit of glory in the racing world, 
has produced many outstanding Uma Musume.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿――Our Mejiro family, in pursuit of glory in the racing world, 
󠁿has produced many outstanding Uma Musume.

data.text:
And among them, there is one who is much more devoted 
to races than any other……Nee-sama, Mejiro Ramonu.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿And among them, there is one who is much more devoted 
󠁿to races than any other……Nee-sama, Mejiro Ramonu.

data.text:
When my older sister was little, there was a time where 
she couldn't run. However, her tenacity helped her 
overcome……when she could run again, her talent blossomed.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿When my older sister was little, there was a time where 
󠁿she couldn't run. However, her tenacity helped her 
󠁿overcome……when she could run again, her talent blossomed.

data.text:
……So much so that, there's probably 
noone in the family that can match her.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: And she still had no trainer……

data.processed:
󠁿……So much so that, there's probably 
󠁿noone in the family that can match her.

data.text:
To be more precise, there was no one who could put up with her. 
As for the reason……because my older sister only loves races.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿To be more precise, there was no one who could put up with her. 
󠁿As for the reason……because my older sister only loves races.

data.text:
The one thing……that drives me. 
Only races――My love.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
󠁿The one thing……that drives me. 
󠁿Only races――My love.

data.text:
My sister expressed that love through "perfection". 
Perfectly conditioning her body, perfectly strategizing, 
perfectly progressing toward victory……
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿My sister expressed that love through "perfection". 
󠁿Perfectly conditioning her body, perfectly strategizing, 
󠁿perfectly progressing toward victory……

data.text:
Sparing no effort to achieve that. Since approaching 
the start of her career, she has diligently and 
thoroughly been preparing for a perfect debut.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿Sparing no effort to achieve that. Since approaching 
󠁿the start of her career, she has diligently and 
󠁿thoroughly been preparing for a perfect debut.

data.text:
……due to her stoic nature, there hasn't been anyone that 
could keep up with her. To my sister, her world consists 
of only her and races, and noone else could enter――
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿……due to her stoic nature, there hasn't been anyone that 
󠁿could keep up with her. To my sister, her world consists 
󠁿of only her and races, and noone else could enter――

data.text:
Put another way, it means she cares about nothing 
else. After being treated like that, most trainers 
would probably lose confidence in themselves.
data.processed:
󠁿Put another way, it means she cares about nothing 
󠁿else. After being treated like that, most trainers 
󠁿would probably lose confidence in themselves.

data.text:
On top of that, becoming the trainer of "Mejiro Ramonu" 
……would also mean shouldering an incredibly important commitment.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿On top of that, becoming the trainer of "Mejiro Ramonu" 
󠁿……would also mean shouldering an incredibly important commitment.

data.text:
Yes. My sister declared it would be proof of her love but…… 
now that the Symboli family has achieved the Classic Triple Crown――
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿Yes. My sister declared it would be proof of her love but…… 
󠁿now that the Symboli family has achieved the Classic Triple Crown――

data.text:
Next it is our Mejiro Family, that must perform 
its obligation. In the Triple Tiara rotation, 
becoming the first in history to achieve it……
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿Next it is our Mejiro Family, that must perform 
󠁿its obligation. In the Triple Tiara rotation, 
󠁿becoming the first in history to achieve it……

data.text:
……a glorious achievement like that, as if it 
were the natural course. Speaking of the 
intense pressure from something like that……
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿……a glorious achievement like that, as if it 
󠁿were the natural course. Speaking of the 
󠁿intense pressure from something like that……

data.text: ……I love Nee-sama's running.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: 󠁿……I love Nee-sama's running.

data.text:
Ever since I was a child, I was always watching 
that back from so close. That free running style…… 
I believe it will lead to a significant track record.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿Ever since I was a child, I was always watching 
󠁿that back from so close. That free running style…… 
󠁿I believe it will lead to a significant track record.

data.text:
It is up to you to choose. However……please 
treat my older sister well. As a younger sister 
――and as a member of the Mejiro family, I ask you.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿It is up to you to choose. However……please 
󠁿treat my older sister well. As a younger sister 
󠁿――and as a member of the Mejiro family, I ask you.

data.text:
――Definitely, she would have been fine with whoever. 
Since her debut had been decided, and because I was 
the first to ask, Mejiro Ramonu had formed a contract.
data.processed:
󠁿――Definitely, she would have been fine with whoever. 
󠁿Since her debut had been decided, and because I was 
󠁿the first to ask, Mejiro Ramonu had formed a contract.

data.text:
To her, the thoughts and emotions of the trainers 
have nothing to do with her……in the course of the 
contract, one might be constantly reminded of this.
data.processed:
󠁿To her, the thoughts and emotions of the trainers 
󠁿have nothing to do with her……in the course of the 
󠁿contract, one might be constantly reminded of this.

data.text:
――While lost in thought, I ended up at the course. There were 
many Uma Musume running, however there was one that stood out……
data.processed:
󠁿――While lost in thought, I ended up at the course. There were 
󠁿many Uma Musume running, however there was one that stood out……

data.text: Haaa…… Haaa…… Haaa……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: 󠁿Haaa…… Haaa…… Haaa……

data.text: Aaaah…… Fufuu…… Fufufu……!
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: 󠁿Aaaah…… Fufuu…… Fufufu……!

data.text:
It was the same as when I first saw her run. With no 
facade, completely……she enjoyed racing from the bottom 
her heart. Seeing that, made my heart skip a beat.
data.processed:
󠁿It was the same as when I first saw her run. With no 
󠁿facade, completely……she enjoyed racing from the bottom 
󠁿her heart. Seeing that, made my heart skip a beat.

data.text:
――I felt that she was one of a kind. From her point of view, 
maybe anyone would have been fine. But for me, that isn't the case.
data.processed:
󠁿――I felt that she was one of a kind. From her point of view, 
󠁿maybe anyone would have been fine. But for me, that isn't the case.

data.text:
As she finished running, my doubts had cleared. 
I hurried off to start preparing for her debut――
data.processed:
󠁿As she finished running, my doubts had cleared. 
󠁿I hurried off to start preparing for her debut――

data.text: I see.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: 󠁿I see.

data.text:
Ramonu didn't even look in my direction. That 
lack of interest made me uneasy…… However, there 
was something I needed to tell her, no matter what.
data.processed:
󠁿Ramonu didn't even look in my direction. That 
󠁿lack of interest made me uneasy…… However, there 
󠁿was something I needed to tell her, no matter what.

data.text: ――So you like it.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

choices.text: I want to revise that answer

data.processed: 󠁿――So you like it.

data.text:
After being moved by Mejiro Ramonu's running, 
and observing the depths of her love……there 
was something that reverberated within me.
data.processed:
󠁿After being moved by Mejiro Ramonu's running, 
󠁿and observing the depths of her love……there 
󠁿was something that reverberated within me.

data.text: I love races.
data.processed: 󠁿I love races.

data.text:
I love races where them just running gets my 
blood pumping. I love races where the Uma Musume 
pour their all in to chasing their dreams.
data.processed:
󠁿I love races where them just running gets my 
󠁿blood pumping. I love races where the Uma Musume 
󠁿pour their all in to chasing their dreams.

data.text:
The whole world changes in an instant after crossing 
the goal. Records and memories woven together in 
to a drama―― I really love races……!
data.processed:
󠁿The whole world changes in an instant after crossing 
󠁿the goal. Records and memories woven together in 
󠁿to a drama―― I really love races……!

data.text:
That's why, I can say it clearly now. If it was for the 
sake of racing, I'd do anything……if it meant I could 
be a part of that history, no matter what it was.
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, I can say it clearly now. If it was for the 
󠁿sake of racing, I'd do anything……if it meant I could 
󠁿be a part of that history, no matter what it was.

choices.text: The first ever Triple Tiara, with you……
choices.processed: <size=43>The first ever Triple Tiara, with you……</size>

choices.text: The first ever Triple Tiara, with you……
choices.processed: <size=43>The first ever Triple Tiara, with you……</size>

data.text:
My sister expressed that love through "perfection". 
Perfectly conditioning her body, perfectly strategizing, 
perfectly progressing toward victory……
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
󠁿My sister expressed that love through "perfection". 
󠁿Perfectly conditioning her body, perfectly strategizing, 
󠁿perfectly progressing toward victory……

data.text:
――If it was her, then she already had a perfect plan. There 
was no point if the trainer didn't go above and beyond. Like――
data.processed:
󠁿――If it was her, then she already had a perfect plan. There 
󠁿was no point if the trainer didn't go above and beyond. Like――

data.text:
Adding the jewel of "perfect" to complete the Triple Tiara…… 
winning every single race up to and including the Triple Tiara――
data.processed:
󠁿Adding the jewel of "perfect" to complete the Triple Tiara…… 
󠁿winning every single race up to and including the Triple Tiara――

data.text:
If running is the way she expresses her love for racing…… 
then supporting that dream is how a Trainer should express it.

choices.text: For races……For you, I'll give it all
For races……For you, I'll give it all

data.processed:
󠁿If running is the way she expresses her love for racing…… 
󠁿then supporting that dream is how a Trainer should express it.

data.text: Vermillion.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: 󠁿Vermillion.

data.text:
The final color I was looking for. 
Now――I've found it.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
󠁿The final color I was looking for. 
󠁿Now――I've found it.

data.text:
……It's finished. 
Aaah, with this……it's complete.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
󠁿……It's finished. 
󠁿Aaah, with this……it's complete.

data.text:
I looked at her painting. It seemed like an abstract 
painting, I couldn't tell what it was or how complete it 
actually was. It was as mysterious as the person herself.
data.processed:
󠁿I looked at her painting. It seemed like an abstract 
󠁿painting, I couldn't tell what it was or how complete it 
󠁿actually was. It was as mysterious as the person herself.

data.text:
……After this, I'll be revising the menu for the upcoming year. 
Before moving on to proper training……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
󠁿……After this, I'll be revising the menu for the upcoming year. 
󠁿Before moving on to proper training……

data.text:
Is that acceptable? 
――Trainer-san.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
󠁿Is that acceptable? 
󠁿――Trainer-san.

data.text:
Mejiro Ramonu smiled――and that was how I first 
set foot in to her world. To create a new history, 
using the love of racing as a common language――
data.processed:
󠁿Mejiro Ramonu smiled――and that was how I first 
󠁿set foot in to her world. To create a new history, 
󠁿using the love of racing as a common language――
